plot: In 2003, on his way home to Berkshire Ben Brown, 18, was hit by an intercity train traveling at 220 km/h. He recovered in no time despite the chance of losing his life at it's highest.
title: This Man's Journey
plot_es: In 2003, on his way home to Berkshire Ben Brown, 18, was hit by an intercity train traveling at 220 km/h. He recovered in no time despite the chance of losing his life at it's highest.
